name: payum/core
description: One million downloads of Payum already! Payum offers everything you need to work with payments. Friendly for all PHP frameworks (Symfony, Laravel, Zend, Yii, Silex). Check more visiting site.

suggest.payum/paypal-express-checkout-nvp: self.version If you want to use paypal express checkout, digital goods or recurring payments
suggest.payum/paypal-pro-checkout-nvp: self.version If you want to use paypal pro checkout
suggest.payum/paypal-rest: self.version If you want to use paypal rest gateway
suggest.payum/paypal-ipn: self.version If you want to use paypal instant payment notifications(Paypal IPN)
suggest.payum/authorize-net-aim: self.version If you want to use Authorize.Net AIM payment gateway
suggest.payum/be2bill: self.version If you want to use be2bill payment gateway
suggest.payum/payex: self.version If you want to use payex payment gateway
suggest.payum/omnipay-v3-bridge: ^1 If you want to use omnipay's gateways
suggest.doctrine/orm: ~2.3 If you want to store models to database using doctrin2 ORM
suggest.doctrine/mongodb-odm: ~1.1 If you want to store models to mongo doctrin2 ODM
suggest.zendframework/zend-db: ~2.0 If you want to store models to Zend Db ORM
suggest.propel/propel1: ~1.7 If you want to store models to Propel1 ORM
suggest.propel/propel: If you want to store models to Propel2 ORM
suggest.symfony/routing: ~2.8|~3.0 If you want to use TokenFactory from symfony's bridge
suggest.symfony/http-kernel: ~2.8|~3.0 If you want to use HttpRequestVerifier from symfony's bridge
suggest.symfony/http-foundation: ~2.8|~3.0 If you want to use HttpRequestVerifier or HttpResponse reply from symfony's bridge
suggest.symfony/form: ~2.8|~3.0 If you want to use forms
suggest.symfony/dependency-injection: ~2.8|~3.0 If you want to use container aware stuff
suggest.monolog/monolog: ~1.0 If you want to use PSR-3 logger
suggest.defuse/php-encryption: ^2 If you want to encrypt gateways credentials in database
